sub_title: Sales Manager EMEA at Epimed International
summary:
Having built my knowledge and international experience in interventional and chronic pain relief and regional anesthesia solutions, I have delivered results that count to my clients and developed profitable business both in the USA and Europe. I enjoy building contacts and connecting stakeholders to bring solutions to patients that make a difference in their lives. Empathy, realism, building strong relationships and consultative selling are among my strongest skills. 

Contact: chadldiebold@gmail.com






Keywords:
pain management 
anesthesia 
interventional pain
neurosurgery 
orthopedic surgery
medical devices
business development
medical product management
distributor management
vendor management
medical market education
sales management
account management
market analysis
lifecycle management
marketing management

profile_positions.description:
Main responsibilities:
• Manage all formalities/activities in officially establishing the European head office.
• Conduct market research per country in the EMEA region.
• Develop a strategy, business plans and a roadmap for implementation for 30 countries.
• Review, build and update the distribution sales network.
• Establish contacts and build relationships with new and existing distributors.
• Align distributor sales and provide training to improve focus on clients and improve 	service levels. 
• Adapt marketing and sales collateral to accommodate EMEA needs and regulations.
• Set up logistics and warehousing facilities in the Netherlands.
• Connect KOLs across Europe and analyze their professional needs and requirements.
• Organize training and workshops for medical practitioners to build awareness and 	required skills 

Results:
• Set up the EMEA business and secured distribution in the UK, Spain, Netherlands, Italy, 	Germany and other countries in the region.
• Increased sales figures by 100% over a 3 years period.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager EMEA

profile_positions.description:
In the position of product manager I was involved in developing the regional anesthesia division, launching a spinal catheter product (Wiley Spinal) reversing the perception of anesthesiologists that spinal catheters were deemed unsafe (after being pulled off the market by the FDA in the early nineties). 

Main responsibilities: 
• Lead an indirect support staff of 7 employees.
• Build the foundation for the Wiley Spinal product including brand identity, sales and 	marketing collateral, website and training videos.
• Launch the Wiley Spinal product and develop sales.
• Build relationships with hospitals and universities to set up demonstrations, trade shows, 	workshops and training.
• Initiate the creation of a regional anesthesia simulator with a high profit margin.
• Provide technical subject matter expertise and advice to senior company management.

Results:
• Successfully launched Wiley Spinal in 2010 and increased revenue by 86% from 2011 to 	2012.
• Secured commitment from several universities and hospitals to conduct controlled 	medical studies necessary to drive awareness and education about the product’s safety.
• Was instrumental in securing a CE Marking for Wiley Spinal.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
In this position, I was responsible for building Epimed’s interventional pain management line including radiofrequency (RF) products. 

Main responsibilities: (Clinical Sales Rep)
• Develop and implement sales strategies in Alabama for Epimed’s interventional pain 	management line.
• Reinvent sales strategies for selling catheters following changes in reimbursement.
• Connect with pain management physicians to provide advice and deliver sales 	presentations.
• Build relationships with distributors to promote products and boost indirect sales.
• Coach and mentor a sales intern to meet and exceed sales targets.

Results:
• Boosted radio frequency line sales by 443% in less than 3 years.
• Grew Y-O-Y revenue by 10% for interventional catheters and nerve block needles.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Sales Representative

				        Medical Assistant
